name: Undark (The_Glowing_Girls, Aqward, Jimena Contreras, Chu357)
description: Undark describes the journey of Sarah and Amelia while they discover each other through time travel communications. Amelia is Sarah's grandmother and part of the Radium Girls, the group of women who worked on the different United Stated Radium factories. The game sets both in the 1920's and in 2000. It's an isometric game of Point & Click and Puzzles in the search of the truth and the discovery of real history.
